items.title: A Personal Finance Guide: Save, Protect, Grow in Recession

visible_instructors.title: R Tutor
visible_instructors.job_title: A expert team of Professors and a Lawyers
visible_instructors.name: R

items.headline: Overcome the effects of the recession caused due to Covid-19 lockdown by applying practical corrective measures.
objectives_summary: List to cause and effects of the recession caused by covid-19 into the life of an individual.
Keep yourself on top of the recession-related issues and make the most out of the Finance Guide: Save, Protect, Grow in Recession
Device a master plan to overcome recession and stay out of the traps of recession associated distress.

items.title: What Happens if I cant Pay My Home Loan-FREE
items.headline: How to get assistance now
objectives_summary: What happens if I cant pay my home loan? What to do next.
How to work with your loan servicer to get assistance.
Question to ask your loan servicer to assist you in getting the help you need now.

items.title: Mastering Student Loans
items.headline: Mastering student loans will transform your life and give you freedom.
objectives_summary: Make Student Loans Compliment Your Life Not dictate It.
How To Save Money In The Long-Run.
Make Student Loans Easy To Understand.

items.title: Cashflow 101
items.headline: How to start managing your spending and making savings now
objectives_summary: How to create your own cash flow and use it to save money now!
This is a step by step course that takes you right from setting up your excel spreadsheet through to creating your first cash flow

You will be able to use the information from your last 3 months of bank statements to create a "forecast" for the next 12 months and then continue after that as you will learn the tools here on how to use the formulas to work out what you will have left at the end of each month

items.title: Money : Matters, Mindset and Mapping for Visionary Creatives
items.headline: See your financial future clearly today. Change it now for a better tomorrow.
objectives_summary: The must-have money management, planning, budgeting, mapping tool and practical skill to succeed financially.
The seer-like ability of the uncommon but lucky few to perceive the truth behind your money movements over time.
Overcome the time, effort, frustrations, and complexities of traditional cookie-cutter one-size-doesn't-fit-all personal money and business finance planning, budgeting, and forecasting.

visible_instructors.name: マスカワ

items.headline: 聞いたことあるけどとにかく日本語の情報が少ない！でもスゴイらしい。エクセルの新機能Power Query、Power Pivot、そしてDAX。あれこれ考えるよりまずは使ってみませんか？
objectives_summary: Power Query, Power Pivot, DAXを全く使ったことのない状態から、これらを使ったピボットテーブルの作成ができるようになります
Power Queryによるデータの取り込み／加工の基礎
Power Pivotによる取り込んだデータ同士の関連付けとピボットテーブルの作成方法

items.headline: エクセルの ピボット テーブル食わず嫌いで避けていません？私もそうでした。使い始めてすぐ「早く知っておけば！」とすごく後悔。でももう心配ありません。このコースでピボットテーブルの経験ゼロから実戦で分析に活かせるヒーローレベルまで４時間で習得
objectives_summary: ピボットテーブルを使ったことがない。からピボットテーブル使えます！と宣言できるまで
実務の中でピボットテーブルを使って得た気づき。どう実務に活かすか？のコツ
サンプルデータにより、実際に手を動かしながら学ぶ、ピボットテーブルの操作法

items.title: Finans Matematiği, Finansal Modelleme ve Finansal Analiz
items.headline: İkinci eğitim ücretsiz! Finansta yaşanan gelişmeleri anlamak, yorumlamak ve sebep-sonuç ilişkilerini çözme ve modelleme
objectives_summary: Bu kurs sayesinde finans sektöründe yaşanan gelişmeleri anlamlandıracak ve sebep sonuç ilişkisini çözeceksiniz.
Bir şirketi incelerken şirketin finansal tablolarına bakarak şirketi doğru şekilde tanıyacak ve şirket hakkında kanaat sahibi olacaksınız.
